item.title: Level up
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

Try to modify it, to look like this.

case 12: //crafting sendFrame164(6263); stillgfx(199, absX, absY); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a crafting level!", 6264); sendFrame126("Your crafting level is now "+playerLevel[12]+" .", 6265); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a crafting level."); NpcDialogueSend = true; if (playerLevel[12] == 99) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (Playername +" has just gotten 99 crafting! and has obtained the crafting skill cape!"); } break;
